io.jenetics.tool.trial

Class TrialMeter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.jenetics.tool.trial.TrialMeter<T>

  • public final class TrialMeter<T>
extends Object
    Represents an function testing measurement environment.
    Since:
    3.4
    Version:
    4.0
    Author:
    Franz Wilhelmst√∂tter

        public void write(OutputStream out,
                  io.jenetics.xml.stream.Writer<? super T> writer)
        Writes the current TrialMeter object (the calculated samples + the parameters) to the given output stream.
        Parameters:
        out - the output stream where to write the trial meter
        writer - the writer of the parameter type
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException - if the marshalling fails

        Return a new trial measure environment.
        Type Parameters:
